original_title: Eu Sou Caipora: A Menina e o Poder das Matas
overview: The animation tells the story of Luana, a girl who is passionate about animals and lives in the countryside of São Paulo. After witnessing her friend Quiquinho, a small capuchin monkey, being captured by smugglers, Luana turns to her grandmother's tales about the legend of Caipora to save him.
title: I Am Caipora
